author: W. S. Merwin
text: The wells have fallen in and have
Under them the impossible road is moving
Down which the broken necked mice push
Balls of blood with their noses
The black coat that fell off the wall
With sleeves trying to say something
Climbing back down the museum wall
To their ancestors the extinct shrews that will
As though it had a right to more
They make the stars of bone
title: Some Last Questions
